name: Sweet Party Crush Puzzle game
description:
**** Welcome to Pop Candy Bubble! ****

MATCH as many sweet candies as you can in a crazy buble blitz manai!
Get POWER-UPS, Candy bubble match deluxe saga , Bombs and Magic Candies to boost your score !

ust swipe to match 3 or more candies blast in a row. Match more than 3 and you make bonus candies witch world with stripes. These bonus candies give you special powers to clear whole rows! Bonus and special rainbow candies give you extra points!

Featuring :

- AWESOME, colorful HD graphics
- Simple, highly ADDICTIVE game play
- Get FREE Bombs and Magic Candies when you match 5 candies
- EASY MODE available, perfect for kids or to get more chain reaction fun
- Live MULTIPLAYER option
- World leaderboard - rule them all !

Join the FUN ! Get this game NOW !

Great for kids and adults alike! TRY IT FOR FREE TODAY! SWEET!

it's very awesome classical fun game, and it will also bring you a totally different story level brand-new lovely mystery experience!
